    • Method Detail

      • publish

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response publish(java.io.InputStream bundle,
                                com.sun.jersey.core.header.FormDataContentDisposition fileDetail,
                                java.lang.String auth_token_enc,
                                java.lang.String groupId,
                                java.lang.String endpointId,
                                java.lang.String bundleName,
                                @Context
                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Method that receives from a server a bundle with the intention of publish it.
        When a Bundle file is received on this end point is required to validate if the sending server is an allowed
        server on this end point and if the security tokens match. If all the validations are correct the bundle will be add it
        to the Publish Thread.
        Parameters:
        bundle - Bundle file stream
        fileDetail - Bundle file Details
        auth_token_enc - Authentication token
        groupId - Group who sent the Bundle
        endpointId - End-point who sent the Bundle
        req - HttpRequest
        Returns:
        Returns a Response object with a 200 status code if success or a 500 error code if anything fails on the Publish process
        See Also:
        PublishThread

      • isValidToken

        public static boolean isValidToken(java.lang.String token,
                   java.lang.String remoteIP,
                   PublishingEndPoint mySelf)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Validates a received token
        Parameters:
        token - Token to validate
        remoteIP - Sender IP
        mySelf - Current end point
        Returns:
        True if valid
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If fails reading the security token
